description: Campusweiter Zugriff (Universität Hannover) - Vervielfältigungen (z.B. Kopien, Downloads) sind nur von einzelnen Kapiteln oder Seiten und nur zum eigenen wissenschaftlichen Gebrauch erlaubt. Keine Weitergabe an Dritte. Kein systematisches Downloaden durch Robots.
@graph.title: The chemistry of metal-organic frameworks : synthesis, characterization, and applications
@graph.abstract: Introduction / Stefan Kaskel -- Network Topology / Frank Hoffmann, Michael Fröba -- MOF Chemistry of Metallic Clusters and Other Nodes. Reticular Chemistry of Metal-Organic Frameworks Composed of Copper and Zinc Metal Oxide Secondary Building Units as Nodes / Alexander Schoedel, Omar M Yaghi -- Alkaline Earth Metal-Based Metal-Organic Frameworks: Synthesis, Properties, and Applications / Debasis Banerjee, Hao Wang, Benjamin J Deibert, Jing Li -- Synthesis, Structure, and Selected Properties of Aluminum-, Gallium-, and Indium-Based Metal-Organic Frameworks / Lars-Hendrik Schilling, Helge Reinsch, Norbert Stock -- Group 4 Metals as Secondary Building Units: Ti, Zr, and Hf-based MOFs / Mathieu Bosch, Shuai Yuan, Hong-Cai Zhou -- Iron and Groups V- and VI-based MOFs / Christian Serre, Thomas Devic -- Platinum Group Metal-Organic Frameworks / Elisa Barea, L Marleny Rodríguez-Albelo, Jorge A R Navarro -- Group 3 Elements and Lanthanide Metals / Klaus Müller-Buschbaum -- Functional Linkers. Extended Linkers for Ultrahigh Surface Area Metal-Organic Frameworks / Hiroyasu Furukawa, Xixi Sun -- Porous Metal Azolate Frameworks / Pei-Qin Liao, Chun-Ting He, Dong-Dong Zhou, Jie-Peng Zhang, Xiao-Ming Chen -- Functional Linkers for Catalysis / Alexandre Legrand, Jérôme Canivet, David Farrusseng -- Chiral Linker Systems / Christel Kutzscher, Philipp Müller, Silvia Raschke, Stefan Kaskel -- Functional Linkers for Electron-Conducting MOFs / Gang Xu, Guo Cong Guo, Ming Shui Yao, Zhi Hua Fu, Guan E Wang -- Linkers with Optical Functionality / Mark D Allendorf, Kirsty Leong, Ryan A Zarkesh -- Special MOF Classes and Morphology Design of MOFs. Nanoparticles / Michael Beetz, Andreas Zimpel, Stefan Wuttke -- SURMOFs: Liquid-Phase Epitaxy of Metal-Organic Frameworks on Surfaces / Lars Heinke, Hartmut Gliemann, Pierre Tremouilhac, Christof Wöll -- Granulation and Shaping of Metal-Organic Frameworks / U-Hwang Lee, Anil H Valekar, Young Kyu Hwang, Jong-San Chang -- Progress in Advanced Characterization of MOFs. Adsorption Methodology / Irena Senkovska, Katie A Cychosz, Philip Llewellyn, Matthias Thommes, Stefan Kaskel -- Nuclear Magnetic Resonance of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs) / Stephan I Brückner, Julia Pallmann, Eike Brunner -- Electron Paramagnetic Resonance / Matthias Mendt, Mantas Šimėnas, Andreas Pöppl -- IR and Raman Spectroscopies Probing MOFs Structure, Defectivity, and Reactivity / Francesca Bonino, Carlo Lamberti, Silvia Bordiga -- In Situ X-ray Diffraction and XAS Methods / Irena Senkovska, Volodymyr Bon -- In Situ Studies of the Crystallization of Metal-Organic Frameworks / Richard I Walton, Franck Millange -- Role of Molecular Simulations in the Field of MOFs / Guillaume Maurin -- Defects and Disorder in MOFs / Olesia Halbherr, Roland A Fischer -- Appendix A: MOF Suppliers -- Appendix B: Datasheets
